name: Red Guards Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to create the stripped-down vessels favored by the Revolutionary Council.

name: Rimward Venture Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to create the bulk efficiency-focused vessels of the Rimward Venture Trading Company.

name: Phoenix Hunter Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to create the warships and support craft of the Stormhawk Republic's Phoenix Hunters.

name: Research Mandate Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to create the research, science, and security vessels of the Independent AI War Research Mandate.

name: Ashen Knights Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to create the effective and occasionally heretically technologically advanced vessels of the Ashen Keepers.

name: Deep Space Mining Blueprint Package
desc:
Enables heavy industry to construct a set of ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs modified or repurposed from Domain-era deep space mining tools, including some long thought lost to the sector.

Recovered tech such as this is as rare in the sector as it is powerful, and the scavengers who risk their lives to bring it back from the far-flung fringe systems where it can be found often prefer to keep it for themselves.
